raw_body: Please join us as we celebrate our store's soft opening on April 20th at 11.00 at main street 123, NY. We've been working hard to open the doors of Honey and Lemon Food and Drink, and we want to invite our most generous supporters for a special night before our grand opening. We plan to provide light snacks and drinks. Please RSVP to confirm your attendance by April 10th.
